testCase.title: Over-receive a purchase order
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving Purchase Orders\55059 : Receive against a PO

fields.System.Title: Over-receive a purchase order

testStepAction.div: Execute the reception of a purchase order

div.P: Enter the receiving area (Regular or Bulk)

DIV.P: Enter the BOL number and accept

testStepAction.div: Execute the inbound document verification checklist

DIV.P: Is the trailer in an acceptable state?
Confirm BOL information or review if needed

div.P: If the user has multiple PO's to enter for this BOL, he can enter them at this step. When the required documents have been entered, continue the process by accepting.

testStepAction.div: Receive an item

DIV.P: When entering a quantity that is above the PO order line, a message is displayed on the screen ( see receive an item step 3.2)
The user must receive the full quantity on the PO before going into over-receiving
When over-receiving an item, a message appears on screen and the user is forced to select a reason code.
Select top link 'Cond. (03)' to select a condition and select the appropriate reason
Finish receiving the product using the normal receiving process

DIV.P: Enter the BOL number and accept

testStepAction.div: Execute the inbound document verification checklist

DIV.P: Is the trailer in an acceptable state?
Confirm BOL information or review if needed

div.P: If the user has multiple PO's to enter for this BOL, he can enter them at this step. When the required documents have been entered, continue the process by accepting.

DIV.P: When prompted to select a document simply accept, DO NOT SELECT THE PO AGAIN
The user can resume the reception

testCase.title: Close a reception on the handheld process
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving Purchase Orders\55052 : Close the reception

fields.System.Title: Close a reception on the handheld process
fields.System.History: @philippe.pereira Bonjour Philippe, l'étape qui demande le numér de lot est optionnel à la condition que le produit requiert un numéro de lot ou non. Pour l'étape 6, les captures d'écrans ont été prises il y a quelques mois ou Solochain CDMV contenait des menus différents. Le procéssus reste le même. Test réactiver. Merci!

testCase.title: Condition change when dimensions are missing
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving customer returns\55074 : Receive against a return order

fields.System.Title: Condition change when dimensions are missing
fields.System.History:
@nadia.costopoulos @Pamela Guérard 
Bonjour Nadia et Pamela, 

Désolé du retard! J'ai modifié l'étape 4 pour mieux expliquer le processus. 

Merci!

testStepAction.div: Execute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: On the handheld device, click on 'INBOUND'.
Select the customer return order document

DIV.P: Select an item to receive that does not have a dimension configured
Validate that the condition is changed to QC (Quality control) automatically
The condition is changed to QC automatically

B.I: Contrary to the reception of a PO with missing dimension, the user will not be prompted to enter the missing dimensions during the receiving process. They will be taken by a QC user and then input via the desktop. The product should then change condition back to 'Serviceable'.

testCase.title: Receive a Serial Number tracked product
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving customer returns\55074 : Receive against a return order

fields.System.Title: Receive a Serial Number tracked product
fields.System.History: @Pamela Guérard Bonjour Paméla, il s'agit d'un comportement normal pour Solochain lors de la réception d'un produit avec numéros de série, ceci lui permet d'ajouter plusieurs numéros de série sous la même référence. Par contre, si un usager reçoit le même produit sur une session différente, Solochain viendrait créer un nouveau numéro de référence pour différencier les 2 sessions. Voici un autre exemple. Test réactivé. Merci!

testStepAction.div: Exceute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: Select a customer return order document

testStepAction.div: Receive an item

DIV.P: When selecting a serial number tracked product, the user is prompted to enter the Serial number
A message is displayed to confirm the Serial number captured, select 'Accept' to continue
The item was received with a trackable serial number

testCase.title: Receive an item with automatic Lot No format
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving customer returns\55074 : Receive against a return order

fields.System.Title: Receive an item with automatic Lot No format

testStepAction.div: Exceute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: Select a customer return order document

testStepAction.div: Receive an item
Access 'All inventory' page

div.P: Fill in the search fields if needed and click on 'Search'

DIV.P: The lot No is created automatically with the Expiry date format
The Lot No is created automatically

testCase.title: Force dimension measurement when missing
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving customer returns\55074 : Receive against a return order

fields.System.Title: Force dimension measurement when missing

testStepAction.div: Execute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: On the handheld device, click on 'INBOUND'.
Select the customer return order document

DIV.P: Validate that there is a message is displayed, the condition is changed to QC because of the missing dimension
On the left are the current values for Weight, Length, Width and Height, Select '- (New Value)'
Validate that there is a message that is displayed, and the dimensions have been updated
The user updated the missing dimensions upon receiving an item

testCase.title: Receiving a GMP item
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving customer returns\55074 : Receive against a return order

fields.System.Title: Receiving a GMP item

testStepAction.div: Access Customer Return Orders Report

div.P: Fill in the search fields if needed and click on 'Search'

DIV.P: When an order line has a tag of Direct QA set to 'true' the product will automatically be set as a GMP

testStepAction.div: Exceute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: Select a customer return order document

DIV.P: Upon reception of a GMP item, a yellow warning appears at the top of the screen
The condition of the item is automatically set to 'Return GMP' and needs to be investigated by a QC user

testCase.title: Receiving a B2C return
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving customer returns\55074 : Receive against a return order

fields.System.Title: Receiving a B2C return

testStepAction.div: Access Customer Return Orders Report

div.P: Fill in the search fields if needed and click on 'Search'

DIV.P: When receiving a return order of type B2C, the condition of the item will change automatically to 'Return B2C'

testStepAction.div: Exceute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: Select a customer return order document

DIV.P: The condition of the item is set automatically to 'Return B2C'

testCase.title: Receiving a Return - Narcotic item
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Receiving customer returns\55074 : Receive against a return order

div.P: Fill in the search fields if needed and click on 'Search'

DIV.P: When receving a return order of type Narcotic, the condition of the item will change automatically to 'Quality Control'

testStepAction.div: Exceute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: Select a customer return order document

The item is automatically set to 'Quality Control' condition

testStepAction.div: Execute the reception of a customer return order

div.P: On the handheld device, click on 'INBOUND'.
Select the customer return order document

testStepAction.div: Execute the inbound document verification checklist

DIV.P: Is the trailer in an acceptable state?
Confirm BOL information or review if needed

div.P: If the user has multiple PO's to enter for this BOL, he can enter them at this step. When the required documents have been entered, continue the process by accepting.

fields.System.History: @philippe.pereira Bonjour Philippe, l'étape qui demande le numér de lot est optionnel à la condition que le produit requiert un numéro de lot ou non. Pour l'étape 6, les captures d'écrans ont été prises il y a quelques mois ou Solochain CDMV contenait des menus différents. Le procéssus reste le même. Test réactiver. Merci!

fields.System.Title: Validate transfer order deletion in Solochain

testStepAction.div: Access Transfer Orders Report

div.P: Fill in the search fields if needed and click on 'Search'

Confirm BOL information or review if needed

div.P: If the user has multiple PO's to enter for this BOL, he can enter them at this step. When the required documents have been entered, continue the process by accepting.

SPAN.style: white-space: normal;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);font-family: Lato, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

testStepAction.div: Start an unplanned reception
Scan or enter the receiving area
Receive an item

DIV.P: When selecting a serial number tracked product, the user is prompted to enter the Serial number
A message is displayed to confirm the Serial number captured, select 'Accept' to continue
The item was received with a trackable serial number

The Lot No is created automatically

testCase.title: Putaway materials from Quality Control zone
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Putaway of inventory\55124 : Putaway inventory

fields.System.Title: Putaway materials from Quality Control zone

testStepAction.div: Execute the putaway process

div.P: On the handheld device, from the main menu, select 'INBOUND'.

DIV.P: Input the container code or the label for materials that are in the quality control zone
Validate that the Information about the item is displayed, including the destination location

P.SPAN: If there is no suggestion is because of inventory condition and needs to be placed in adequate QA or RETURN location

DIV.P: Scan or enter the destination location
Validate that a message is displayed, and that the item has been putaway successfully

testCase.title: Putaway to primary location
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Putaway of inventory\55124 : Putaway inventory

fields.System.Title: Putaway to primary location

testStepAction.div: Execute the putaway process

div.P: On the handheld device, from the main menu, select 'INBOUND'.

DIV.P: Input the container code or the label for materials to putaway
Validate that the Information about the item is displayed, including the destination location

P.SPAN: If there is no suggestion is because of inventory condition and needs to be placed in adequate QA or RETURN location

DIV.P: Scan or enter the destination location
Validate that a message is displayed, and that the item has been putaway successfully

testCase.title: Putaway to reserve location
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Putaway of inventory\55124 : Putaway inventory

fields.System.Title: Putaway to reserve location

testStepAction.div: Execute the putaway process

div.P: On the handheld device, from the main menu, select 'INBOUND'.

DIV.P: Enter or scan inventory to putaway and accept
Validate that the Information about the item is displayed, including the destination location

P.SPAN: If there is no suggestion is because of inventory condition and needs to be placed in adequate QA or RETURN location

DIV.P: Enter or scan the destination and accept
Validate that a message is displayed, and that the item has been putaway successfully
The user putaway inventory to a reserve location

testCase.title: Putaway to reserve location in same zone
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Putaway of inventory\55124 : Putaway inventory

fields.System.Title: Putaway to reserve location in same zone

testStepAction.div: Execute the putaway process

div.P: On the handheld device, from the main menu, select 'INBOUND'.

DIV.P: Enter or scan inventory to putaway and accept

P.SPAN: If there is no suggestion is because of inventory condition and needs to be placed in adequate QA or RETURN location

DIV.P: Enter or scan an available location in the same zone
Validate that a message is displayed, and that the item has been putaway successfully
The user putaway inventory to a different reserve location in the same zone

fields.System.Title: Update conditon of a return order

testStepAction.div: Retrieve the All Inventory Page

div.P: From the Solochain Main Menu Page, click on 'Inventory'.

DIV.P: Fill in the search fields if needed and click on 'Search'
In the 'Condition' column, click on the current condition
Select a condition and reason with the drop down menus

testCase.title: Update return order condition MOBILE
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Managing Anomalies\55117 : Update the conditions of the return orders

fields.System.Title: Update return order condition MOBILE
fields.System.History: @cole.cote Hello Cole, the error message you received is indeed because there is still an instance for that reception that is not closed yet but this is highly due to the amount of data manipulation and environment refresh that occur in the testing phase. This of course would not happen with the regular work flow. Got to the receipts summary reports, type in your order No. and in the Receipt Date filter, put the value to 'Year to Date' and you should see it. Simply close this instance and the problem should be fixed. Thank you!

DIV.P: A message is displayed, the condition of the material has been changed

testCase.title: Move return order to trash
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Managing Anomalies\55115 : Eliminate the returns

fields.System.Title: Move return order to trash

DIV.P: A message is displayed, the item/CO has been moved

div.P: The user oved the item/CO to a trash location

testCase.title: Adjust inventory quantity on the desktop
testCase.suitePath: \Inbound Operations\Managing Anomalies\55115 : Eliminate the returns

fields.System.Title: Adjust inventory quantity on the desktop
fields.System.History:
@Pamela Guérard @nadia.costopoulos @Georges-Elie Voyer
Bonjour Pamela,
Cette erreur survient lorsque l'inventaire que tu tentes d'ajuster est lié à une réception qui n'a pas encore été fermée. Un ajustement à faire sur le quantité réceptionné va être fait par le réceptionneur au besoin et les ajustements subséquents pourront être fait une fois la réception fermée.

Pour résoudre ceci je te dirigerais vers les tests suivants qui indiquent comment fermer les réceptions soit via le desktop ou l'unité mobile:
#56517
#56516

testStepAction.div: Retrieve the All Inventory Page

div.P: From the Solochain Main Menu Page, click on 'Inventory'.

DIV.P: Fill in the search fields if needed and click on 'Search'
In the 'Quantity' column, click on the item to adjust
